headline.main: STATE ' AFFAIRS.; Senator Brooks-Removal of Quarantine-The Commissioners-Bank Agencies-Railroad voting A curious Proceedings Legislative Recess-work in the Assembly. NEW - YORK LEGISLATURE.

docs.lead_paragraph: I am somewhat mortified to be reliably assured that I have done injustice to Senator BROOKS, in assuming that during the debate on the proposed amendments to the Constitution to permit negroes to exercise the right of suffrage, he had given a quisi-justification to the assault made by PRESTON S. BROOKS upon Senator SUMMER.
